item.title: BAE Systems
item.description: World’s 6th largest arms company, tied to some of the most corrupt deals in history last time I checked with Saudia Arabia etc.

item.title: Edgar Brothers
item.description: One of the oldest UK wholesalers of arms, based in Macclesfield’s Lyme Green business park. They supply all police forces, as well as the [[MoD]].

item.title: Elbit Ferranti
item.description: Company that exports drones to Israel used to bomb Palestinians. Various campaigns against this. Based in Oldham. Elbit produces 85% of all drones (Unmanned Aerial Vehicles, UAV) used by the Israeli army, including the Hermes 450 and 900 drones which Israeli forces can equip with two air to ground missiles, or targeting systems to mark a target for other aircraft to attack.

item.title: Lockheed Martin
item.description: They ran the 2011 UK Census data center in Trafford Park, but they lost the contract for subsequent years. They may have other Manchester involvement.

item.title: Nammo
item.description: one of the world’s largest independent providers of specialist ammunition and rocket motors. They appear to have a trademark for center-x registered through a Manchester law company

item.title: Northrop Grumman
item.description: Seem to literally make nukes?? “The U.S. is coming to the table on arms control even as it moves forward in its $8 billion effort to replace its aging Minuteman Ground Based Strategic Deterrent (GBSD) with a new intercontinental ballistic missile to be developed by Northrop Grumman (NYSE:NOC).

item.title: Raytheon
item.description: “Raytheon is fourth in SIPRI’s list of the top 100 arms companies. Its website describes its Missile Systems business as “the world’s premier missile maker, providing defensive and offensive weapons for air, land, sea and space”.

item.title: Rebellion Defence Ltd
item.description: mission-focused AI products for the defence and security of the United Kingdom, the United States, and our allies. Their registered office is in Altrincham, but share an address with a large number of other companies.
